name: 2-[(E)-2-(4-Hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol
Reason: 2-[(E)-2-(4-Hydroxy-3-methoxyphenyl)vinyl]-6-methoxy-4-methylphenol is a complex molecule with multiple functional groups that can affect its melting point. To estimate the melting point, we can consider the following functional groups and their effects: (1) The presence of a hydroxyl group (-OH) can increase the melting point by about +10 degrees Celsius due to hydrogen bonding. (2) The methoxy group (-O-CH3) can increase the melting point by about +5 degrees Celsius due to the increased molecular weight and polarity. (3) The vinyl group (-CH=CH-) can increase the melting point by about +15 degrees Celsius due to the increased molecular weight and rigidity. (4) The phenol group (-OH-C6H4-O-) can increase the melting point by about +20 degrees Celsius due to the presence of a strong hydrogen bond donor. (5) The methyl group (-CH3) can minutely reduce the melting point due to the reduced polarity.
